DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine ED90 infusion phenylephrine prevent spinal induce low blood pressure parturients present elective cesarean delivery . The up-down methodology ( UDM ) commonly use study method determine dose drug cause desire effect 90 % subject give . For example : investigator want know best dose phenylephrine ( range commonly use dos ) prevent drop blood pressure cesarean delivery ninety time one hundred give dose . The ED90 effective dose 90 % subject `` positive '' response phenylephrine infusion , i.e . drop blood pressure . The investigator hypothesize ED90 40 - 60 mcg/min . The primary outcome measure ED90 phenylephrine infusion prevent drop blood pressure woman undergo cesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Up-Down Determination ED90 Phenylephrine Hypotension Prophylaxis Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nonemergent cesarean delivery plan spinal anesthesia ( i.e . elective planned cesarean delivery malposition , patient choice , cervical pelvic disproportion , previous cesarean delivery diagnosis require predetermine cesarean delivery ) 2 . American Society Anesthesia physical status class I & II ( ASA I Healthy , ASA II mild control systemic disease , eg . control essential hypertension ) 3 . Age ≥ 18 year ( Standard within obstetrical literature ) 4 . Term gestational age 5 . Englishspeaking 1 . Morbid Obesity ( Body Mass Index ≥ 45 kg/m2 ) ( Morbidly obese parturients require dose local anesthetic less standardized dose study , typically exaggerated response vasopressor , blood pressure cuff occasionally need replaced intraarterial catheter due limitation size ) 2 . Height < 5 ' 0 '' ( Women < 5 ' 0 '' likely require dose local anesthetic less standardized dose study ) 3 . Laboring woman 4 . Urgent emergency cesarean delivery 5 . Hypertensive disease pregnancy 6 . Severe maternal cardiac disease 7 . Subjects monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOI 's ) tricyclic antidepressants 8 . Fetal anomaly intrauterine fetal death 9 . Failed spinal anesthesia 10 . Subject enrollment another study involve study medication within 30 day CD 11 . Any physical psychiatric condition may impair ability cooperate study data collection
